entities.name: teapot
entities.description: The teapot is mentioned as an object used to make tea. It is described as part of the scene where the giant is making tea.

entities.name: chipped mugs
entities.description: The chipped mugs are mentioned as objects that are present in the hut. They are not being used at this time.

entities.name: bottle of amber liquid
entities.description: The bottle of amber liquid is mentioned as an object that the giant takes a swig from before making tea.

entities.name: sausages
entities.description: The sausages are mentioned as objects being cooked on the poker. They are described as fat, juicy, and slightly burnt.

entities.name: poker
entities.description: The poker is mentioned as an object used for cooking the sausages.

entities.name: Dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as a person present in the hut. He does not say anything while the giant is working.

relationships.description: The giant is cooking the sausages on the poker. This relationship is described as the giant sliding the first six fat, juicy, slightly burnt sausages from the poker.
The giant is using the poker to cook the sausages. This relationship is described as the giant working with the poker.
The giant and Dudley are in close proximity to each other, as they are both present in the hut. This relationship is described as nobody saying a thing while the giant is working.
